titles.title: Commending Turkish Americans nationwide for their rich contributions to American cultural, social, economic, and civic life, and for other purposes.
Commending Turkish Americans nationwide for their rich contributions to American cultural, social, economic, and civic life, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: Commends Turkish Americans for their contributions to American cultural, social, economic, and civic life.
